segments.text: You seem to be upset . What ’ s eating you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s because of my son . Dick keeps getting on my nerves
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dick ? How come ? He used to be as meek as a lamb .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he used to be . But now he ’ s drifting off track .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He must have been in bad company , or he wouldn ’ t be off the beans .
segments.speaker: S1
